DOC.brief_summary: In study two question answer : - mindfulness meditation help cell-changed cervix disappear ? - mindfulness meditation lower psychological distress woman abnormal cervical cancer screen result ?
DOC.brief_title: Can Alternative Treatment Have Impact Cervical Dysplasia ?
DOC.detailed_description: 200 woman , participate cervical cancer screen mild dysplasia , randomize two group ; intervention group control group . The intervention group ask mindfulness meditation twice week listen instruction CD . 200 additional woman normal cervical screening result also include project .
DOC.criteria: Women age 2329 year Participated cervical cancer screen Having mild dysplasia normal screen result Women previously dysplasia
